response.original_title: Hilario Duran and His Latin Jazz Big Band: From the Heart
response.overview: Cuban jazz sensation Hilario Durán and his band electrify audiences at the Toronto Jazz Festival in this energetic concert. Durán demonstrates his diversity and style with a program of mostly original pieces drawn from his numerous influences. Fellow musicians Paquito D'Rivera, Horacio "El Negro" Hernandez, Alexis Baro and Dione Taylor pitch in for "Mambo Influenciado," "From the Heart," "Rumba for Chano," "Blem Blem Blem," "Angel Eyes" and more.
response.title: Hilario Duran and His Latin Jazz Big Band: From the Heart
